_sText:
Surf Takeshis Castle style

My third map about Takeshis Castle challenges and surfing!
If u dont know what Takeshis Castle is, just youtube it!
This map is V1 so I might upload V2 later when I add more challenges

This map is about racing, you have to complete tasks and who gets first to the end presses a button to teleport evry1 in the jail and you get weps so you win.

First pic - U need to run past the right doors but watchout there r holes that will slow u down.

Second pic - Get speed to jump through 3 holes

Third pic - Theres a question about me and jump in the hole u think its the right answer, the holes got teleports and if u choose wrong, u have to complete doors again. 2 ways r the right ones that go to the surf in the second pic.

4th pic - Like in Takeshis Castle, you need to run and jump on the rocks without falling in the water, if u fall in the water you have to start over again. Beware, some of the rocks r pushable so if u jump on them they sink into the water with you.

And many, many more like Surfing, running over a bridge with traps, black & white room, Running past a room with traps

At the end, the red button kills and blue button teleports all players to that jail and u can headshot them all =P

Enjoy // .#Css.eu CREW & Westsid3r, Sabatan and Van helsing
